com.flytxt.churn
Class churntoy

java.lang.Object
  com.flytxt.churn.churntoy

public class churntoy
extends java.lang.Object

A prototype for churn prediction of the mobile subscribers using LibSVM [http://www.csie.ntu.edu.tw/~cjlin/libsvm/]

Author:
rahul.mishra

learnModel

public static void learnModel(java.lang.String train_file,
                              java.lang.String model_file)
This method creates a model from the training data and saves it into a file.

Parameters:
train_file - path of the training file. This needs to be in libsvm format.
model_file - path of the model file. Model needs to be persisted in this file for prediction usage.

testModel

public static void testModel(java.lang.String test_file,
                             java.lang.String model_file,
                             java.lang.String output_file)
                      throws java.io.IOException
This method predict the class and generates statistics like confusion matrix, F-measure, Precision, recall, and accuracy for giving insights about quality of the model. It dumps the predicted labels in the output_file

Parameters:
test_file - path of the test file
model_file - path of the model_file [model is loaded from this file]
output_file - path of the output_file [predicted labels are output into this file]
Throws:
java.io.IOException
